roleset.name: process coal into coke
roleset.note: COKE-V, COKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: coke-v
example.text: I'm using so much fuel that I-1 find the need *PRO*-1 to coke the coal into a more efficient fuel.

example.name: coking-n
example.text: It has been well established that the most important range of temperature during coal coking is 400–500°C
